synopsis.text: Kenichi, the strongest disciple in history, faces new challenges after his triumph over Ragnarok. As the Ryozanpaku masters uncover a formidable alliance among their adversaries, the entire dojo, including both masters and students, becomes the target of skilled martial artists. With the stakes higher than ever, Kenichi's training intensifies, pushing him to his limits. Meanwhile, inspired by Kenichi's burgeoning strength, former Ragnarok members embark on their own journeys to enhance their combat skills. These exciting developments are captured in a series of OVAs, bundled with volumes 46 to 56 of the manga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
